ca.ualberta.CMPUT301F13T02.chooseyouradventure

Class Decision

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualberta.CMPUT301F13T02.chooseyouradventure.Decision

  • public class Decision
extends java.lang.Object
    This class encapsulates the data of a page's decisions which link two pages of a story together with a prompt. This class is part of the model of the application; as such it is serialized with the rest of the story to be stored using a Handler implementation.
    Author:
    James Cadek, James Moore
